item.title: Responds to 831017 ltr re conversion from high to low enriched U fuel at univ research reactors.NRC willingness to encourage federal financial support appreciated.

item.title: Submits daily staff notes.Discusses PNO-I-83-122, PNO-V-83-057 & PNS-V-83-013 & issuance of license renewal for Rensselaer Polytechnical Inst.
